name: CondaAuthenticate
description: Authentication task for the conda client
author: Microsoft Corporation

messages.Info_AddingFederatedFeedAuth: Adding auth information from service connection %s for feed %s
messages.FailedToGetServiceConnectionAuth: Unable to get federated credentials from service connection: %s.

inputs.name: workloadIdentityServiceConnection
inputs.label: 'Entra Workload ID-backed Azure DevOps user' Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, feedUrl is required. Credentials for registries outside this organization/collection and registries in npmrc are ignored.

inputs.name: feedUrl
inputs.label: Azure Artifacts Feeds url
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, workloadIdentityServiceConnection is required. All other inputs are ignored. Not compatible with customEndpoint. Feed Url should be in the npm registry format, e.g. https://pkgs.dev.azure.com/{ORG_NAME}/{PROJECT}/_packaging/{FEED_NAME}/npm/registry/
